objects.description: SHOTPUT has a command to list all servers in the domain, as well as one to locate domain controllers on a domain.

external_references.description: Falcone, R. and Wartell, R.. (2015, July 27). Observations on CVE-2015-3113, Prior Zero-Days and the Pirpi Payload. Retrieved January 22, 2016.
